name: @pkgwatch/api-client
description: Shared API client for PkgWatch services

scripts.verify-dist: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['dist/index.js', 'dist/index.d.ts', 'dist/dependencies.js', 'dist/dependencies.d.ts', 'dist/discovery.js', 'dist/discovery.d.ts', 'dist/repo-scanner.js', 'dist/repo-scanner.d.ts'].forEach(f => { if (!fs.existsSync(f)) throw new Error('Missing: ' + f); }); console.log('All dist files present');"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run verify-dist
